sentences.en: Bandanna handkerchiefs, too, are still made only in blue or red.
sentences.cn: 现在一种印花大手帕也仍旧只染成蓝色或红色.

sentences.en: He knotted the bandanna around his neck.
sentences.cn: 他在脖子上系了一条印花大围巾。

sentences.en: He was wearing a bright yellow T-shirt and a bandanna around his neck.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件亮黄色的T恤，脖子上围着一条鲜艳的印花大围巾。

sentences.en: He wiped his forehead with a blue bandanna and smiled again.
sentences.cn: 他用一条蓝色的大手帕擦擦前额,又笑了笑.

sentences.en: I saw her: blond hair pulled back in a bandanna, thick - soled shoes, work - hardened hands.
sentences.cn: 我看得见她: 金色的头发用一块大手帕包着, 厚底鞋, 粗糙的一双手.

sentences.en: She arrived in a wheelchair , unable to walk from metastatic fractures, wearing a stylish bandanna.
sentences.cn: 骨折让她无法行走,她坐着轮椅, 戴着有型的丝巾.

sentences.en: She could be identified by the gaudy bandanna she wore as a head covering.
sentences.cn: 只要看到有一块绚丽的印花大手帕扎在头上的,那就是她.

sentences.en: The next morning, he bundled up some food in a red bandanna handkerchief, told his parents good-by, and set off into the world .
sentences.cn: 次日早晨，他用一块红色的印花大手帕包了一些点心，告别了双亲，出发去闯天下。

sentences.en: These days, her bandanna is usually red.
sentences.cn: 这些天，她的印花大手帕通常是红色的。
